com.viaoa.process

Class OAProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.process.OAProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public abstract class OAProcess
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Similiar to a future or promise to track a process.
    Author:
    vvia
